black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) standing outside a large wooden door with a "PRINT SHOP" sign, looking hesitant, peeking around the doorframe, wearing a crown and simple dress.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The King looking worried, talking to (character), who looks determined and is holding up a sparkling, rainbow-colored ruler.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, Inside a print shop, big complicated machines with gears and rollers loom over tiny (character). Steam comes out of one machine. (Character) looks small but walking forward.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A round, messy monster made entirely of dripping ink blobs with a goofy, naughty grin. Splashes on the floor around it. (Character) pointing a ruler at it.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A skinny, jagged goblin made of crumpled paper and tape holding a stack of shiny books in its crinkly claws. (Character) looks angry and brave.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Character) using a ruler to straighten a piece of paper. The Ink-Blob and Paper-Jam monsters look sad and defeated, shrinking away into a dark corner.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Character) hugging a large stack of glowing, perfect books with a big smile. The machines in the background look quiet.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A triumphant scene. (Character) holding the books high in the air. The King is clapping, and cute castle animals are cheering around (character). The sun is shining brightly.
